footer.text: Character Guide â€¢ Passive Talents: Heizou

fields.name: Pre-Existing Guilt
fields.value:
*Unlocked at Ascension 1*
> Decreases sprinting stamina consumption for the party by 20% (won't stack with other, similar Talents)

fields.name: Paradoxical Practice
fields.value:
*Unlocked at Ascension 4*
> When Heizou activates a Swirl reaction, he gains one Declension stack. Can occur every 0.1 seconds

fields.name: Penetrative Reasoning
fields.value:
*Unlocked Automatically*
> After Heartstopper Strike hits an opponent, the party's Elemental Mastery (except Heizou's) increases by 80 for 10 seconds.
